caption.p: Antiviral innate immune response to flavivirus infection. qRT-PCR analysis of innate antiviral immune response mRNA levels in baseline conditions ( a) and following flavivirus infection ( b). hiPSCs, NSCs, and neurons were infected with ZIKV (MOI 1), DENV-2 (MOI 1), and WNV (MOI 0.01) and harvested at 96 hpi. Data are represented as mean ± SD from three independent experiments conducted in quintuplicate. * p < 0.05, Student’s t-test.
